metadata.synopsis: Trespassing on South Bridge - back up if player tries to do something sneaky.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Try to walk past in area |Klara Elin| - S_WYR_WyrmRock_SouthBridgeGuard_001 44b0baf1-84e8-4a67-bf45-81ee304bc731 - (6; 43; 176)ORenter trigger - S_WYR_WyrmRock_SouthBridgeSpotArea eb13e6d7-a0dc-4f85-9984-44b4a5fa4893 - (2; 42; 172)

0.speaker: Blaze Elin, Fist Shah
0.text: This area's forbidden. Back off or face my blade.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: Indeed? Back to the public area, then.
